ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.content:
Cacao Paste*, Cacao Powder*, Lion’s Mane*, Reishi*, Ashwagandha*, Ceylon Cinnamon*, Oryx Desert Salt*
*ORGANIC

brew-guide.title: Brew Guide
brew-guide.content:
Add 1½ - 2 Tbsp (15g) to 200-250ml of warm milk of choice or water. Do not boil. 
 Allow time to melt and merge. 
 To froth, mix in a blender, plunge up and down vigorously in a French press, or shake in a jar. 
 Add sweetener if desired.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Domestic shipping takes 2-5 business days, while international shipping varies by location. All packages are carefully packaged to ensure your Mood Magick arrives in perfect condition.
